io.github.bigbio.pgatk.io.common

Interface MzReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AplIndexedReader, MgfIndexedReader, MzMlIndexedReader, MzXMLIndexedReader, PrideJsonIndexedReader

    public interface MzReader
extends Serializable
    Parser for a peak list formats. NOTE: Every class implementing the MzReader interface should contain the following static function: public static Spectrum getIndexedSpectrum(File sourcefile, IndexElement indexElement)
    Author:
    jg, ypriverol

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean acceptsDirectory()
      Indicates whether the given peak list parser supports the parsing of directories.
      boolean acceptsFile()
      Indicates whether the given peak list parser supports the parsing of single files.
      Map<String,IndexElement> getIndexElementForIds()
      Returns a Map containing the spectra ids as keys and the associated IndexElementS as values.
      List<Integer> getMsLevels()
      Returns a list of ms levels (as integers) found in the parsed file.
      List<IndexElement> getMsNIndexes(int msLevel)
      Returns a list of IndexElements for the spectra of the given MS level in the file.
      int getSpectraCount()
      Returns the number of spectra in the given file / directory.
      List<String> getSpectraIds()
      Returns a list of Strings that hold the spectra's ids.
      Spectrum getSpectrumById(String id)
      Returns the spectrum with the given id.
      Spectrum getSpectrumByIndex(int index)
      Returns the spectrum based on its 1-based index in the file.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpectraCount

        int getSpectraCount()
        Returns the number of spectra in the given file / directory.
        Returns:

      • acceptsFile

        boolean acceptsFile()
        Indicates whether the given peak list parser supports the parsing of single files.
        Returns:

      • acceptsDirectory

        boolean acceptsDirectory()
        Indicates whether the given peak list parser supports the parsing of directories.
        Returns:

      • getSpectraIds

        List<String> getSpectraIds()
        Returns a list of Strings that hold the spectra's ids. The order of the returned ids resembls the order the spectra are returned in the spectra iterator. For formats that do not support ids such as dta or mgf the spectrum's 1-based index is used as id.
        Returns:

      • getSpectrumById

        Spectrum getSpectrumById(String id)
                  throws PgatkIOException
        Returns the spectrum with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The spectrum's id.
        Returns:
        A Spectrum or null in case a spectrum with the given id doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        PgatkIOException

      • getSpectrumByIndex

        Spectrum getSpectrumByIndex(int index)
                     throws PgatkIOException
        Returns the spectrum based on its 1-based index in the file. In case the parser is parsing a directory the index will be translated to the filename's position in the directory (which can be random).
        Parameters:
        index - The 1-based index of the spectrum in the file.
        Returns:
        A Spectrum or null in case a spectrum with the given index doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        PgatkIOException

      • getMsNIndexes

        List<IndexElement> getMsNIndexes(int msLevel)
        Returns a list of IndexElements for the spectra of the given MS level in the file.
        Parameters:
        msLevel - The ms level of the spectra to get the index elements for.
        Returns:
        A list of IndexElementS

      • getMsLevels

        List<Integer> getMsLevels()
        Returns a list of ms levels (as integers) found in the parsed file.
        Returns:
        List of ms levels in the file.

      • getIndexElementForIds

        Map<String,IndexElement> getIndexElementForIds()
        Returns a Map containing the spectra ids as keys and the associated IndexElementS as values.
        Returns:
        Map with spectra ids as key and their IndexElements as values.
